font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. （以武力）强制：to achieve by force or threat
【例】be coerced into agreeing
【例】A confession供认 was coerced from the suspect by police.
【近】force, threaten, compel
【派】coercion n. 强力压迫：the act of persuading someone forcefully to do something that they do not want to do
【反】voluntary behavior 自愿的行为
【记】 音:抠扼死 抠住对方扼死→强迫压制；与force后部分音同
